column5: Gorgeous 4 bedroom 3 in a quarter bath home with all the amenities   Lots of yard space front and back, hammock on a tree, many gorgeous trees with lots of shade all around the home and property.  A large bar-b-q- pit in the back of a open patio with a outstanding hill top view of 5 acres surrounded by nature and the hill country. I have two large air mattress's. A lot of floor space. Don't provide cable but do Crome, full Internet service for Netflix, Hulu
